Literature.Title: Rational Design and Synthesis of Modified Teixobactin Analogues: In Vitro Antibacterial Activity against Staphylococcus aureus, Propionibacterium acnes and Pseudomonas aeruginosa
Literature.Author: Ng V, Kuehne SA, Chan WC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus SH1000(IC50=7.96±0.36µM),Staphylococcus aureus SH1000(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MU50(MIC=8µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes ATCC 11828(MIC=4µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes ATCC 6919(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>256µg/ml)
